title: Achilles shield Translated as the other seuen bookes of Homer, out of his eighteenth booke of Iliades. By George Chapman Gent.
author: Homer.
publisher: Imprinted by Iohn Windet, and are to be sold at Paules Wharfe, at the signe of the Crosse Keyes,
notes: Sometimes bound with: Seaven bookes of the Iliades of Homere, prince of poets: London, 1598.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
